name: Be The Ruler
description:
Lore

In this game you play The Ruler, a demon chief who exiled himself in a volcano to master the aspect of fire. His mission is to conquer the last territory inhabited by beasts only vulnerable to fire.


How To Play

Just download the .zip to get started. You will be able to play 4 different difficulty presets. In each difficulty your goal is to clear the "Final Wave" wich can be selected on the Altar located in the center of the map. To make this objective easier you can farm xp by clearing easier waves to upgrade your character. 

To kill monsters you can burn them with the Fire Aspect Aura around you and by casting a Fire Aspect Detonation directly on them.

Via the altar, make your own rules to progress through the game !

Keys

LeftClick to move, Right Click to cast a spell, E to interact with the Altar, Escape to Pause
